column5:
CREATE TABLE "SIN" (
	`_id`	INTEGER,
	`COMMANDMENT_ID`	INTEGER,
	`ADULT`	INTEGER,
	`SINGLE`	INTEGER,
	`MARRIED`	INTEGER,
	`RELIGIOUS`	INTEGER,
	`PRIEST`	INTEGER,
	`TEEN`	INTEGER,
	`FEMALE`	INTEGER,
	`MALE`	INTEGER,
	`CHILD`	INTEGER,
	`CUSTOM_ID`	INTEGER,
	`DESCRIPTION`	VARCHAR,
	PRIMARY KEY(_id)
)
CREATE TABLE "PRAYERS" ("_id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY ,"PRAYERNAME" VARCHAR,"PRAYERTEXT" VARCHAR,"GROUPNAME" VARCHAR, "CUSTOM" INTEGER)
CREATE TABLE "PERSON_2_SIN" ("PERSON_ID" INTEGER,"SINS_ID" INTEGER, "COUNT" INTEGER, "EDITED" INTEGER, "DELETED" INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY ("PERSON_ID","SINS_ID") )

CREATE TABLE "PERSON" (
	`_id`	INTEGER,
	`MARRIED`	INTEGER,
	`ACTOFCONTRITION`	INTEGER,
	`BIRTHDATE`	INTEGER,
	`LASTCONFESSION`	INTEGER,
	`NAME`	VARCHAR,
	`PASSWORD`	VARCHAR,
	`SEX`	INTEGER,
	PRIMARY KEY(_id)
)
CREATE TABLE "INSPIRATION" ("_id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY ,"QUOTE" VARCHAR,"AUTHOR" VARCHAR)
CREATE TABLE "COM_2_SIN" ("COMMANDMENT_ID" INTEGER,"SIN_ID" INTEGER, "EDITED" INTEGER, "DELETED" INTEGER, "PERSON_ID" INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY ("COMMANDMENT_ID","SIN_ID") )
CREATE TABLE "COMMANDMENTS" ("_id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY ,"NUMBER" INTEGER,"TEXT" VARCHAR,"CATEGORY" VARCHAR,"COMMANDMENT" VARCHAR, "CUSTOM_ID" INTEGER)

CREATE TABLE guide_main (
    "_id" INTEGER,
    "h_id" INTEGER,
    "g_id" INTEGER,
    "g_title" TEXT,
    "text" TEXT   
, "img_name" TEXT)

CREATE TABLE "guide_header" (
    "_id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    "h_id" INTEGER,
    "text" TEXT
    
)

CREATE TABLE "SIN_ACTIVE" (
	`_id`	INTEGER,
	`COMMANDMENT_ID`	INTEGER,
	`ADULT`	INTEGER,
	`SINGLE`	INTEGER,
	`MARRIED`	INTEGER,
	`RELIGIOUS`	INTEGER,
	`PRIEST`	INTEGER,
	`TEEN`	INTEGER,
	`FEMALE`	INTEGER,
	`MALE`	INTEGER,
	`CHILD`	INTEGER,
	`CUSTOM_ID`	INTEGER,
	`DESCRIPTION`	TEXT,
	PRIMARY KEY(_id)
)
